scripts.dev: nodemon --watch ./src --ext ts --exec "tsc -b && node ./dist/index.js" # This runs the index.ts file in the dist folder with node, and watches for changes in the src folder, recompiling with tsc and rerunning the changed file when it changes. --ext ts is used to tell nodemon to watch for .ts files instead of .js, and --exec is used to run a custom command when a watched file changes
